overview_of_class: This course invites students to think social-scientifically about questions of national security (American and otherwise). It addresses questions such as follows: What are the causes of war? What are possible paths to peace? What are momentarily the most pressing security challenges? What tools exist to counter these challenges?
name: National Security
title: WCAS POLI_SCI 345-0-20 National Security

descriptions.name: Overview of class
